TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 6
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F. Austin to Ramon Musquiz, 01-15-1828

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to Ramon Musquiz, January 15, 1828. Acknowledging announcement that Musquiz has assumed office of political chief. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_footnotes: From Translation of Empresario Contracts p, 274, General Land Office of Texas,
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 6

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Ramon Musquiz, January 15, 1828. Acknowledging announcement that Musquiz has assumed office of political chief. (Omitted.) */p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe,*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="01-15-1828">January 15, 1828*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*See Calendar*/p*
